backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles, worker profiles, and booking management with filtering and sorting utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PWA-related features to files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of major frontend source files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables for the app.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA metadata, manifest link, icons, and service worker registration.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page shown when no network connection is available.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, navigation fallback, and offline handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the main app with theme, auth providers, and a full route tree including public, onboarding, and protected pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with a button redirecting users to the browse workers page.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAcco: Checks if the user has selected an account type and redirects to onboarding if not, showing a loading state when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Guards routes by requiring authentication, showing a loader during initialization and redirecting unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Restricts access based on user role and redirects to the appropriate dashboard when roles do not match.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Renders a list of bookings with status, details, and links to booking pages, or an empty state if none exist.
Maps booking statuses to labels and badge styles and displays the corresponding badge.
frontend/src/components/bookings/CreateB: Form for creating a booking with fields for date, details, and location, submitting data via callback.
Provides the main layout with top navigation, content area, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar showing role‑based links, logo, and sign‑out functionality.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Displays a worker’s profile summary including category, description, rate, and link to view full profile.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerPr: A form component for creating or editing a worker profile, including category selection, description, service area, rate, and active status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccountType.ts: Hook that retrieves the current user's account type and provides convenience booleans for client or worker roles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, initializing identities, handling login/logout, and exposing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, worker profiles, bookings, and browsing workers using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BookingDetail.tsx: Page showing detailed booking info, worker data, and actions for updating booking status with role-based behavior.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseWorkers.tsx: Displays a worker browsing page with category filtering and rate sorting, fetching active workers and rendering them in a card layout.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboard.tsx: Shows a client's upcoming and past bookings, with loading states and a link to browse workers.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingAccountType: Handles user onboarding flow to choose an account type and enter a name, then saves the profile and redirects accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Provides a sign‑in screen using Internet Identity and redirects authenticated users to browsing.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDashboard.tsx: Displays worker profile completeness and categorized booking lists, with loading states and profile editing navigation.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDetail.tsx: Shows detailed worker info and allows clients to submit booking requests, handling loading and missing profiles.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerProfile.tsx: Renders a form to create or update a worker profile, handling save operations and loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container-query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing the project's feature set, versions, and functional summaries for authentication, routing, profiles, and roles.
